QuestData.Title: Ji of the Huojin
QuestData.Description: Another of my most talented students is awaiting you in Wu-Song Village to the northwest. He is of a different mind than Aysa, but in their differences, they bring balance to each other.$B$BJi Firepaw will instruct you on gathering the offerings for the spirit of fire. Trust in his wisdom.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ji Firepaw in Wu-Song Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello! You look poised and confident... I like that!$B$BI've heard some rather impressive whispers about you from the training grounds. If you're half as capable as they say, I think you and I are going to be good friends!
